text: My mom always said, 'Don't date a guy who thinks he's prettier than you.'
author: Alicia Keys

text: My mom was an actress in the local Seattle theater doing experimental plays.
author: Rainn Wilson

text: Everything I am is because of my mom.
author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

text: In a school where everyone is famous or rich or whatever, you have a culture, 'What does your dad do?' 'What does your mom do?'
author: Cynthia Nixon

text: We've all seen the mom who devotes all her time and attention to her child and is so hungry for adult interaction that as soon as she's around another adult, she's not paying attention anymore.
author: Cynthia Nixon
